result.title: Geodatabase on agricultural soil properties including SOC and agricultural soil functional properties related to water and nutrients
result.description: The collection of agricultural soils information by the EJP SOIL participating countries will allow the production of a set of harmonised databases and the set of country maps on SOC in agricultural soils, agricultural soil functional properties related to water and nutrients, main agricultural soil management systems, intensive crop production influencing soil biodiversity.

result.title: Report on synthesis of impact of policies on agricultural land abandonment and the impact on soil health and landscape processes in the EJP SOIL partner countries
result.description: This synthesis will make and inventory in the relevant countries across the EJP SOIL partnership the extent of the problem of land abandonment and assess the role of specific land related policies on land abandonment.
